overview: American retailers lose $45 billion annually to theft. And for every dumb kid who thinks he's above the law, there's a loss prevention officer eager to get him. Watch as these criminals sweat it out before they're given a hard choice: go with the cops and ruin their lives... or get bareback fucked hard by the officer who caught them and go free. Each scene is shot on hidden cameras, capturing every stressful moment, including interrogations, pat-downs, and even invasive cavity searches. Humiliated and thoroughly used, these young perp delinquents have no choice but to bend over and take it.
title: Young Perps 2
